PluginData.Author: Viktor
PluginData.Tooltip: Extra functionality and convenience features for the vanilla projector block: Intuitive manual alignment of the projector.
PluginData.Description:
Allows intuitive alignment of loaded projections using the usual movement and rotation keys.
Adds button to load a self-repair projection of the projector's own grid.
Compatible with the Multigrid Projector, but it does not require the plugin.
Works with online multiplayer games without the need for a server plugin.
For support join the SE Mods Discord: https://discord.gg/PYPFPGf3Ca
